parameters.name: DataNames
parameters.description: The name of the data file. Separate multiple names with commas (,). By default, all data files are queried.

parameters.name: DataVersions
parameters.description: The version number of the data file. Separate multiple numbers with commas (,). By default, all versions of data files are queried.

parameters.name: EnsRegionIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the ENS nodes.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The ID of the Edge Node Service (ENS) instance. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,). By default, all edge instances are queried.

parameters.name: MaxDate
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the 2006-01-02 format. By default, the time range to query is not restricted.

parameters.name: MinDate
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the 2006-01-02 format. By default, the time range to query is not restricted.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. This parameter is optional if you want to return the distribution status of all data files.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. This parameter is optional if you want to return the distribution status of all data files.
